data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 13,034,600 souls living in the county of Narayanpur with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Narayanpur, Chhattisgarh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Narayanpur, Chhattisgarh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Narayanpur, Chhattisgarh, India. Please, stir the 143,381 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, help the 143,381 believers in Narayanpur to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 12,891,219 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Sauntia people might believe through him.
Jesus, please give your people in Narayanpur, Chhattisgarh, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Narayanpur, Chhattisgarh, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary:
the county of Narayanpur, Chhattisgarh, India has a population of 13,034,600.

We estimate Narayanpur has 143,381 people who might know Jesus, 158,153 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 12,733,066 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Narayanpur, Chhattisgarh, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
